sofya.ed.semantic
Interface SemanticEventDispatcher.InstrumentationManagerRequestor

Enclosing class:
SemanticEventDispatcher
public static interface SemanticEventDispatcher.InstrumentationManagerRequestor

The callback interface used to pass the instrumentation manager to interested consumers at a safe point in the target launch process.

Analyses that wish to make use of adaptive instrumentation features should register an object implementing this interface with the event dispatcher prior to launching the target program. The callback method will be invoked at a safe point in the process of starting the target program, at which time the analysis can obtain and store the reference to the instrumentation manager.

Method Summary
 void setInstrumentationManager(InstrumentationManager instManager)
          Callback that is invoked by the event dispatcher when the instrumentation manager is initialized and available.
 

Method Detail
